/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/Erics3DEngine.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Erics3DEngine.dir/src/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Erics3DEngine.dir/src/Program.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Erics3DEngine.dir/src/Application.cpp.o  -o Erics3DEngine -rdynamic -lGLU -lGL /usr/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/local/lib/libglfw.so -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lXinerama -lpthread -lrt -lXi -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:/usr/local/lib
